pr-3bea3535-101f-4de2-9d7f-d8a0f11c770e.title: Fix for bug in function XYZ
pr-3bea3535-101f-4de2-9d7f-d8a0f11c770e.description: I've created a fix for the reported bug in function XYZ. This fix handles the edge cases correctly and won't affect the current functionality of the rest of the codebase.

comments.content: Here's the PR for the fix. I've thoroughly tested it and it seems to work as expected. Please let me know if there's anything else you'd like me to modify.

I see that the PR is still open. If you're busy, I'd be happy to help maintain the project. I've been following it for a while and would love to contribute more actively. Please let me know if you're interested in that idea.
Hi @lambdaLover24, thank you for your contribution and the offer to help maintain the project. I'll review your PR and get back to you shortly.

Hi @lambdaLover24, I've reviewed your PR and the fix looks good to me. I'm going to merge your changes. Also, considering your active involvement and offer to help, I'd like to add you as a maintainer. Can you confirm if you're still interested?
